data.name: Finger Gun
data.description:
Finger Gun: Itâ€™s exactly what it sounds like. 

Use your hands in the shape of guns (no touch controllers required!) and immerse yourself in childhood fantasy as you shoot, grapple, and survive an onslaught of dangerous robots on your quest to capture Doc Holliday and claim his epic bounty. Use powerful morph modules to unlock your full potential, plus an upgrade system ensures you have a unique journey every time you play. Purpose-built from the ground up, Finger Gun provides a streamlined hand-tracking showcase experience by putting players hands-first into the action from the very start.

changelog.change_log:
*Game Modes can now be unlocked by progressing in the game, allowing players to play the regular mode, or jump into a specific sector to face enemies in 90, 180 or 360 degrees.
*New "Explorer" and "Hardcore" difficulties have been added.
*Leaderboards have been added for each combination of Game Mode and Difficulty.
*Doc's new toy in the cave highlights player progression and allows to select the desired Game Mode and Difficulty.
*The Wave System has been redesigned to allow for a more dynamic experience that adapts to the player. As a part of this change, there are now 5 instead of 6 rounds before each Boss.
*Scouts and T-RR shooting probability has been redesigned to prevent their attacks from overlapping as much.
*Overarching balance changes to enemies, weapons, upgrades and score to accommodate the system changes.
*Minor bug fixes.

* Improved Finger Gun detection when shooting with arms extended.
* Reworked glove models.
* Made it harder to accidentally lose Modules. 
* Reworked upgrade slot machine animations.
* Module Port now opens and lights up when holding a Module.
* Added new VFX when shooting invulnerable enemies.
* Minor improvements to hook tutorial.
* Minor bug fixes.

+ Fixed multiple situations where Guides (previously known as Enforcers) showed at the wrong times.
+ Gloves now turn red to indicate if tracking was lost (replaces Tracking Lost Enforcer)
+ Added button panel to start elevator.
+ Improved textures of the metal pieces in the player's gloves.
+ Fixed multiple bugs that caused unexpected results in a Ram-Bot's behavior.
+ Dill-Os now show the correct shader effect when they are damaged.
+ Tweaked Hook instructions.
+ Instructions now position dynamically to adapt to the player.
+ Added a new heart particle when a life is lost. 
+ Added a few missing SFX.
+ Pop-Ups no longer show the indication to flip the card/object if there's no extra info behind.
+ Added overheating shader to the Boss's revolver (now matches the player).
+ Fixed a bug that caused some explosions to be larger than intended.
+ Other minor bug fixes.
+ Still repurposing abandoned hats.

+ Fixed an issue that prevented users on Quest 2 from playing the highest quality version of the game.

+ Fixed server related connectivity issue.

+ Added a sparks particles to all wagons.

+ Reached and highest rounds are now properly stored and uploaded to the leaderboard.

+ Tweaked enforcer positions.

+ Fixed a bug that caused B.H.B. to move bellow the play

+ Hook instructions now show at the start location of the cave.

+ Repurposed abandoned hats.
